extensionDescription.message: Provides custom search field for smart keywords (bookmark keywords).

switchToRecentlyUsed.tooltip.message: Switch to the view ordeded by Recently Used (Ctrl/⌘ - ←)

switchToAll.tooltip.message: Switch to the view ordeded by Name (Ctrl/⌘ - →)

howToAdd.description.message: There is no bookmark item for keyword search. To start search with keyword, plases right-click on a search field in any webpage and choose "Add a keyword for this Search", or just create a bookmark with a URL including "%s" as a paceholder for the search term. Then they will be listed here and you can search with keyword directly from this panel.

config.defaultOpenIn.backgroundTab.message: a New Background Tab (popup will stay open after search)

config.accelActionOpenIn.caption.message: Open search result for actions with accel key (Ctrl/⌘) in

config.recycleBlankCurrentTab.label.message: Recycle current blank tab, instead of new tab

config.recycleTabUrlPattern.label.message: Recycle more tabs with URI matchis to following regular expression:

config.defaultEngine.label.message: Default search engine when nothing item is selected ("%s" will be replaced to the search term):

config.favIconProvider.label.message: Icon provider ("%s" will be replaced to the origin part of the bookmark's URI:
